text:
Proclamation under the Duties Act 2001

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 227(1)(d) of the Duties Act 2001 –

        (a) amend the proclamation notified in the Gazette on 1 July 2001 as Statutory Rules 2001, No. 76 by –
                (i) inserting in paragraph (a) the following subparagraph after subparagraph (v):
                            (va) Tasmanian Learning and Skills Authority;
                (ii) omitting subparagraph (viii) from paragraph (a); and
        (b) declare that this proclamation takes effect on the day on which the Vocational Education and Training Amendment (Tasmanian Learning and Skills Authority) Act 2004 commences.
22 December 2004

W. J. E. COX

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

P. A. LENNON

Treasurer

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 29 December 2004

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Treasury and Finance.
